data.name: ALL_Tank_Menu_Desc
data.value: Features and options involving shared role actions for Tanks.

data.name: ALL_Tank_Interrupt_Desc
data.value: Replaces Low Blow (Stun) with Interject (Interrupt) when the target can be interrupted. For PLDs this feature will add Shield Bash when Interject and Low Blow are on cooldown.

data.name: ALL_Tank_Interrupt_Retarget_Desc
data.value: Will retarget the interrupt if the caster is not your current target.

data.name: ALL_Tank_Reprisal_Desc
data.value: Prevents the use of Reprisal when target already has the effect by replacing it with Savage Blade.

data.name: ALL_Tank_ShirkRetargeting_Desc
data.value: Retargets Shirk to the other tank if there is one.

data.name: ALL_Tank_ShirkRetargeting_Healer_Desc
data.value: Will Retarget Shirk to healers, instead of the other tank. Only recommended during some specific enrages.

data.name: ALL_Tank_ShirkRetargeting_Fallback_Desc
data.value: Will Retarget Shirk to tanks or healers, per your setting above, but will include a fallback to any tank OR healer if none of your setting is found. Useful to help your Shirk always go to *someone* even if your chosen players are not alive.

data.name: ALL_Healer_Menu_Desc
data.value: Features and options involving shared role actions for Healers.

data.name: ALL_Healer_Raise_Desc
data.value: Changes the class' Raise Ability into Swiftcast.

data.name: ALL_Healer_Raise_Retarget_Desc
data.value: Will Retarget the Raises affected here to your Heal Stack.

data.name: ALL_Healer_EsunaRetargeting_Desc
data.value: Retargets Esuna (outside of combo usage) to your Heal Stack, checking if each potential target in the stack has a cleansable debuff.

data.name: ALL_Healer_RescueRetargeting_Desc
data.value: Retargets Rescue (outside of combo usage) to UI Mouseover and additional options.

data.name: ALL_Caster_Menu_Desc
data.value: Features and options involving shared role actions for Magical Ranged DPS.

data.name: ALL_Caster_Addle_Name
data.value: Magical Ranged DPS: Double Addle Protection

data.name: ALL_Caster_Addle_Desc
data.value: Prevents the use of Addle when target already has the effect by replacing it with Savage Blade.

data.name: ALL_Caster_Raise_Desc
data.value: Changes the class' Raise Ability into Swiftcast. Red Mage will also show VerCure if Swiftcast is on cooldown.

data.name: ALL_Caster_Raise_Retarget_Desc
data.value: Will Retarget the Raises affected here to your Heal Stack.

data.name: ALL_Melee_Menu_Desc
data.value: Features and options involving shared role actions for Melee DPS.

data.name: ALL_Melee_Feint_Desc
data.value: Prevents the use of Feint when target already has the effect by replacing it with Savage Blade.

data.name: ALL_Melee_TrueNorth_Desc
data.value: Prevents the use of True North when its buff is already active by replacing it with Savage Blade.

data.name: ALL_Ranged_Menu_Desc
data.value: Features and options involving shared role actions for Physical Ranged DPS.

data.name: ALL_Ranged_Mitigation_Name
data.value: Physical Ranged DPS: Double Mitigation Protection

data.name: ALL_Ranged_Mitigation_Desc
data.value: Prevents the use of Tactician/Troubadour/Shield Samba when target already has one of those three effects by replacing them with Savage Blade.

data.name: ALL_Ranged_Interrupt_Name
data.value: Physical Ranged DPS: Ranged Interrupt Feature

data.name: ALL_Ranged_Interrupt_Desc
data.value: Replaces Foot Graze with Head Graze when target can be interrupted.

data.name: AST_ST_Simple_DPS_Desc
data.value: Replaces Malefic with a full one-button single target rotation, including automatic dps card assignment. This is the ideal option for newcomers to the job.

data.name: AST_AOE_Simple_DPS_Desc
data.value: Replaces Gravity with a full one-button AoE rotation, including automatic dps card assignment. This is the ideal option for newcomers to the job.

data.name: AST_Simple_ST_Heals_Desc
data.value: Replaces Benefic with a full one-button single target healing utility. This is the ideal option for newcomers to the job. Particularly with autorotation.

data.name: AST_Simple_AoE_Heals_Desc
data.value: Replaces Helios with a full one-button single target healing utility. This is the ideal option for newcomers to the job. Particularly with autorotation.

data.name: AST_ST_DPS_Desc
data.value: Replaces Malefic or Combust with options below

data.name: AST_ST_DPS_Opener_Desc
data.value: Adds the Balance opener from level 92 onwards.

data.name: AST_ST_DPS_CombustUptime_Desc
data.value: Adds Combust to the DPS feature if it's not present on current target, or is about to expire.

data.name: AST_ST_DPS_Move_DoT_Desc
data.value: "Will reapply DoT early to all enemies within range while moving."

data.name: AST_DPS_LightSpeedHold_Desc
data.value: Retains 1 Lightspeed charge for manual use

data.name: AST_DPS_LightspeedBurst_Desc
data.value: Add Lightspeed before Divination Combine with Lightspeed Hold Options to ensure you have a charge to use

data.name: AST_DPS_AutoPlay_Desc
data.value: Weaves your Balance or Spear card (best used with Quick Target Cards)

data.name: AST_DPS_CardPool_Desc
data.value: Pools your dps cards for the Divination window

data.name: AST_DPS_LordPool_Desc
data.value: Holds Lord of Crowns for the Divination window

data.name: AST_ST_DPS_EarthlyStar_Desc
data.value: Adds Earthly Star placement, but not detonation, to the rotation. Will be targeted to any enemy, then your focus target, then soft and hard targets, before falling back to placing it at your feet.

data.name: AST_ST_DPS_StellarDetonation_Desc
data.value: Adds early Stellar Detonation with Giant Dominance based on targets HP percentage and type of encounter

data.name: AST_DPS_Lucid_Desc
data.value: Adds Lucid Dreaming when MP drops below slider value

data.name: AST_AOE_LightSpeedHold_Desc
data.value: Retains 1 Lightspeed charge for manual use

data.name: AST_AOE_LightspeedBurst_Desc
data.value: Add Lightspeed before Divination. Combine with Lightspeed Hold Options to ensure you have a charge to use

data.name: AST_AOE_AutoPlay_Desc
data.value: Weaves your Balance or Spear card (best used with Quick Target Cards)

data.name: AST_AOE_CardPool_Desc
data.value: Pools your dps cards for the Divination window

data.name: AST_AOE_LordPool_Desc
data.value: Holds Lord of Crowns for the Divination window

data.name: AST_AOE_DPS_EarthlyStar_Desc
data.value: Adds Earthly Star placement, but not detonation, to the rotation. Will be targeted to your focus target, then soft and hard targets, before falling back to placing it at your feet.

data.name: AST_AOE_DPS_StellarDetonation_Desc
data.value: Adds early Stellar Detonation with Giant Dominance based on targets HP percentage and type of encounter

data.name: AST_AOE_DPS_MacroCosmos_Desc
data.value: Adds Macrocosmos to the Aoe rotation after 3 GCDs

data.name: AST_AOE_Lucid_Desc
data.value: Adds Lucid Dreaming when MP drops below slider value

data.name: AST_ST_Heals_Desc
data.value: Replaces Benefic with a one button healing replacement.

data.name: AST_ST_Heals_Esuna_Desc
data.value: Applies Esuna to your target if there is a cleansable debuff.

data.name: AST_ST_Heals_AspectedBenefic_Desc
data.value: Adds Aspected Benefic & refreshes it if needed.

data.name: AST_ST_Heals_EssentialDignity_Desc
data.value: Essential Dignity will be added when the target is at or below the value set.

data.name: AST_ST_Heals_EssentialDignity_Emergency_Desc
data.value: Will retain a charge of Essential Dignity to use at a different threshold.

data.name: AST_ST_Heals_Spire_Desc
data.value: Adds The Spire (Shield) when the card has been drawn.

data.name: AST_ST_Heals_Ewer_Desc
data.value: Adds The Ewer (Heal over time) when the card has been drawn.

data.name: AST_ST_Heals_Arrow_Desc
data.value: Adds The Arrow (increased healing) when the card has been drawn.

data.name: AST_ST_Heals_Bole_Desc
data.value: Adds The Bole (Reduced Damage) when the card has been drawn.

data.name: AST_ST_Heals_CollectiveUnconscious_Desc
data.value: Adds Collective Unconscious (for the regen so it will not channel).

data.name: AST_ST_Heals_SoloLady_Desc
data.value: Adds Lady of Crowns, if the card is drawn.

data.name: AST_AoE_Heals_Desc
data.value: Replaces Aspected Helios/Helios Conjunction or Helios with a one button healing replacement.This Spell will be consider the bottom priority with no checks regardless of below settings.

data.name: AST_AoE_Heals_LazyLady_Desc
data.value: Adds Lady of Crowns, if the card is drawn.

data.name: AST_AoE_Heals_Horoscope_Desc
data.value: Adds Horoscope followed by Aspected Helios or Helios.

data.name: AST_AoE_Heals_NeutralSect_Desc
data.value: Adds Neutral Sect and its followup Sun Sign.

data.name: AST_AoE_Heals_StellarDetonation_Desc
data.value: Adds Stellar Detonation when under the effect of Giant Dominance.

data.name: AST_AoE_Heals_CollectiveUnconscious_Desc
data.value: Adds Collective Unconscious (for the regen so it will not channel).

data.name: AST_Cards_QuickTargetCards_Desc
data.value: When you play the Balance or Spear in a combo, this will automatically target the buff on to a party member. It will look at DPS that suit the card first, following The Balance's priorities; if none found or they have buffs already, will look at the other DPS instead. Will try to skip party members that have damage downs or rez sickness. Will default to you if no suitable party members were found.

data.name: AST_Benefic_Desc
data.value: Changes Benefic 2 to Benefic when Benefic 2 is not unlocked or available.

data.name: AST_Raise_Alternative_Retarget_Desc
data.value: Will Retarget the Raise affected here to your Heal Stack.

data.name: AST_Lightspeed_Protection_Desc
data.value: Blocks the Lightspeed Button while buff is active.

data.name: AST_Mit_ST_Desc
data.value: Changes Exaltation into Essential Dignity and/or Celestial Intersection after use. Each action can be Retargeted with the Retargeting Features below.

data.name: AST_Mit_AoE_Desc
data.value: Changes Collective Unconscious into Neutral Sect/Sun Sign and/or Aspected Helios/Helios Conjuction for shield after use.

data.name: AST_Raidwide_Desc
data.value: Collection of tools designed to try and cast during a raidwide attack when detected. This will work for most, but not all raidwide attacks and is no substitute for learning the fight

data.name: AST_Raidwide_CollectiveUnconscious_Desc
data.value: Additionally, Will try to Weave Collective Unconscious when a raidwide casting. Will be used in all 4 main combos.

data.name: AST_Raidwide_NeutralSect_Desc
data.value: Additionally, Will try to Weave Neutral Sect and Sun sign when a raidwide casting. Will be used in all 4 main combos.

data.name: AST_Raidwide_AspectedHelios_Desc
data.value: Additionally, Will try to cast Aspected Helios with Neutral Sect Buff for shields when a raidwide casting. Will be used in all 4 main combos.

data.name: AST_Retargets_Desc
data.value: Collection of Options to Retarget Manually-Used Single Target Heals.

data.name: AST_Retargets_Benefic_Desc
data.value: Retargets Benefic and Benefic II to the heal stack (even from the Benefic 2 Downgrade Feature above).

data.name: AST_Retargets_AspectedBenefic_Desc
data.value: Retargets Aspected Benefic to the heal stack.

data.name: AST_Retargets_EssentialDignity_Desc
data.value: Retargets Essential Dignity to the heal stack.

data.name: AST_Retargets_Exaltation_Desc
data.value: Retargets Exaltation to the heal stack.

data.name: AST_Retargets_Synastry_Desc
data.value: Retargets Synastry to the heal stack.

data.name: AST_Retargets_CelestialIntersection_Desc
data.value: Retargets Celestial Intersection to the heal stack.

data.name: AST_Retargets_HealCards_Desc
data.value: Retargets the 4 Healing Cards (Ewer, Arrow, Bole, Spire) to the heal stack.

data.name: AST_Retargets_EarthlyStar_Desc
data.value: Retargets Earthly Star to the the ground Under yourself.

data.name: BLM_ST_SimpleMode_Desc
data.value: Replaces Fire with a full one-button single target rotation. This is the ideal option for newcomers to the job.

data.name: BLM_AoE_SimpleMode_Desc
data.value: Replaces Blizzard II with a full one-button AoE rotation. This is the ideal option for newcomers to the job.

data.name: BLM_ST_AdvancedMode_Desc
data.value: Replaces Fire with a full one-button single target rotation. These features are ideal if you want to customize the rotation.

data.name: BLM_ST_Opener_Desc
data.value: Adds the Balance opener at level 100.

data.name: BLM_ST_FlareStar_Desc
data.value: Add Flare Star to the rotation.

data.name: BLM_ST_Triplecast_Desc
data.value: Add Triplecast to the rotation. Will only be used if Swiftcast is on cooldown.

data.name: BLM_ST_Manaward_Desc
data.value: Adds Manaward to the rotation when below HP Treshold and when raidwide is casting.

data.name: BLM_ST_Addle_Desc
data.value: Adds Addle when Raidwide is detected casting.

data.name: BLM_AoE_AdvancedMode_Desc
data.value: Replaces Blizzard II with a full one-button AoE rotation. These features are ideal if you want to customize the rotation.

data.name: BLM_AoE_ParadoxFiller_Desc
data.value: Adds Paradox as a filler at max level to the rotation.

data.name: BLM_AoE_Thunder_Desc
data.value: Add (High) Thunder II to the rotation.

data.name: BLM_AoE_Blizzard4Sub_Desc
data.value: Substitutes Freeze for Blizzard 4 whenever it would hit 2 targets.

data.name: BLM_Retargetting_Aetherial_Manipulation_Desc
data.value: Retargets Aetherial Manipulation to UI/Field Mouseover

data.name: BLM_TriplecastProtection_Desc
data.value: Replaces Triplecast with Savage Blade when you already have triplecast active.

data.name: BLM_Fire1and3_Desc
data.value: Replaces Fire I or Fire III with the options below.

data.name: BLM_F1toF4_Name
data.value: Fire I to Fire IV Feature

data.name: BLM_F1toF4_Desc
data.value: Replaces Fire I with Fire IV when available.

data.name: BLM_Fire4_Desc
data.value: Replaces Fire IV with the options below.

data.name: BLM_Flare_Desc
data.value: Replaces Flare with the options below.

data.name: BLM_Blizzard1and3_Desc
data.value: Replaces Blizzard I or Blizzard III with the options below.

data.name: BLM_B1toB4_Name
data.value: Blizzard I to Blizzard IV Feature

data.name: BLM_B1toB4_Desc
data.value: Replaces Blizzard I with Blizzard IV when available.

data.name: BLM_Blizzard4toDespair_Desc
data.value: Replaces Blizzard IV with Despair when in Astral Fire.

data.name: BLM_Freeze_Desc
data.value: Replaces Freeze with Ice Paradox when you have 3 Umbral Heart stacks. Changes Freeze to Blizzard II when synched down.

data.name: BLM_FlareParadox_Desc
data.value: Replaces Flarestar with Fire Paradox when not at max Flarestar stacks.

data.name: BLM_AmplifierXeno_Desc
data.value: Replaces Amplifier with Xenoglossy when at max Polyglot stacks.

data.name: BLM_XenoThunder_Desc
data.value: Replaces Xenoglossy with Thunder when Thunder is 3 secs or lower.

data.name: BLM_FoulThunder_Desc
data.value: Replaces Foul with Thunder II when Thunder is 3 secs or lower.

data.name: BLM_UmbralSoul_Desc
data.value: Replaces Transpose with Umbral Soul when Umbral Soul is available.

data.name: BLM_ScatheXeno_Desc
data.value: Replaces Scathe with Xenoglossy when available.

data.name: BLM_Between_The_LeyLines_Desc
data.value: Replaces Ley Lines with Between the Lines when Ley Lines is active.

data.name: BLM_Aetherial_Manipulation_Desc
data.value: Replaces Aetherial Manipulation with Between the Lines when you are out of active Ley Lines and standing still.

data.name: BLU_NewMoonFluteOpener_Desc
data.value: Turns Moon Flute into a full opener. Use the remaining 2 charges of Winged Reprobation before starting the opener again! Can be done with 2.50 spell speed. Feather Rain is Retargeted to your target, so you don't have to place it.

data.name: BLU_NewMoonFluteOpener_DoTOpener_Desc
data.value: Changes the opener to apply either Mortal Flame or Breath of Magic instead of using Winged Reprobation. Requires 2.20 or faster spell speed

data.name: BLU_Opener_Desc
data.value: Turns Moon Flute into a full opener. Here for historical value; level 80 opener is more potent. Feather Rain is Retargeted to your target, so you don't have to place it.

data.name: BLU_FinalSting_Desc
data.value: Turns Final Sting into the buff combo of: Moon Flute > Tingle > Whistle > Final Sting. Feather Rain is Retargeted to your target, so you don't have to place it.

data.name: BLU_Primals_Desc
data.value: Adds Rose of Destruction, Feather Rain, Glass Dance, and J Kick to the combo. Feather Rain is Retargeted to your target, so you don't have to place it.

data.name: BLU_SoloMode_Desc
data.value: Uses Basic Instinct if you're in an instance and on your own.

data.name: BLU_Ultravibrate_Desc
data.value: Turns Ultravibration into Ram's Voice if Deep Freeze isn't on the target. Will swiftcast Ultravibration if available.

data.name: BLU_HydroPull_Desc
data.value: Uses Hydro Pull before using Ram's Voice.

data.name: BLU_PrimalCombo_Desc
data.value: Turns Feather Rain into Shock Strike, Rose of Destruction, and Glass Dance. Will cause primals to desync from Moon Flute burst phases if used on cooldown. Feather Rain is Retargeted to your target, so you don't have to place it.

data.name: BLU_PrimalCombo_Pool_Desc
data.value: Holds spells if Moon Flute burst is about to occur and spells are off cooldown.

data.name: BLU_PrimalCombo_JKick_Desc
data.value: Adds J Kick to the combo.

data.name: BLU_PrimalCombo_SeaShanty_Desc
data.value: Adds Sea Shanty to the combo.

data.name: BLU_PrimalCombo_WingedReprobation_Desc
data.value: Adds Winged Reprobation to the combo.

data.name: BLU_PrimalCombo_Matra_Desc
data.value: Adds Matra Magic to the combo.

data.name: BLU_PrimalCombo_PhantomFlurry_Desc
data.value: Adds Phantom Flurry to the combo.

data.name: BLU_BuffedSoT_Desc
data.value: Turns Song of Torment into Bristle so Song of Torment is buffed.

data.name: BLU_LightHeadedCombo_Desc
data.value: Turns Peripheral Synthesis into Mustard Bomb when target is under the effect of Lightheaded.

data.name: BLU_PerpetualRayStunCombo_Desc
data.value: Turns Perpetual Ray into Sharpened Knife when target is stunned and in melee range.

data.name: BLU_MeleeCombo_Desc
data.value: Turns Sonic Boom into Sharpened Knife when in melee range.

data.name: BLU_Addle_Desc
data.value: Turns Magic Hammer into Addle when off cooldown.

data.name: BLU_KnightCombo_Desc
data.value: Turns Black Knight's Tour or White Knight's Tour into its counterpart when the enemy is under the effect of the spell's debuff.

data.name: BLU_DebuffCombo_Desc
data.value: Puts Devour, Off-Guard, Lucid Dreaming, and Bad Breath into one button when under Tank Mimicry.

data.name: BLU_PeatClean_Desc
data.value: Changes Deep Clean to Peat Pelt if current target is not inflicted with Begrimed.

data.name: BRD_ST_SimpleMode_Desc
data.value: Replaces Heavy Shot with a full one-button single target rotation. This is the ideal option for newcomers to the job.

data.name: BRD_AoE_SimpleMode_Desc
data.value: Replaces Quick Nock with a full one-button AoE rotation. This is the ideal option for newcomers to the job.

data.name: BRD_ST_AdvMode_Desc
data.value: Replaces Heavy Shot with a full one-button single target rotation. These features are ideal if you want to customize the rotation.

data.name: BRD_ST_Adv_Balance_Standard_Desc
data.value: Adds the Balance opener at level 100.

data.name: BRD_Adv_Song_Desc
data.value: This option adds the Bard's Songs to the Advanced Bard Feature.

data.name: BRD_Adv_DoT_Desc
data.value: Enables the use of dot sub options below

data.name: BRD_Adv_Buffs_Desc
data.value: Adds buffs onto the Advanced Bard feature. Enable all to follow balance buff windows Disabling any buff will follow simple priority

data.name: BRD_Adv_BuffsResonant_Desc
data.value: Adds Resonant Arrow to the Rotation after Barrage.

data.name: BRD_Adv_BuffsEncore_Desc
data.value: Adds Radiant Encore to the Rotation after Finale.

data.name: BRD_ST_ApexArrow_Desc
data.value: Adds Apex Arrow and Blast shot

data.name: BRD_ST_Adv_oGCD_Desc
data.value: Weave Sidewinder, Empyreal arrow, Bloodletter, and Pitch perfect when available.

data.name: BRD_Adv_Pooling_Desc
data.value: Pools Bloodletter charges and Sidewinder to allow for optimum burst phases

data.name: BRD_Adv_ApexPooling_Desc
data.value: Pools Apex arrow into buff window and when buffs are between 50-60 seconds on cd.

data.name: BRD_Adv_Interrupt_Desc
data.value: Uses interrupt during the rotation if applicable.

data.name: BRD_ST_SecondWind_Desc
data.value: Uses Second Wind when below set HP percentage.

data.name: BRD_ST_Wardens_Desc
data.value: Uses Wardens Paeon when you have a cleansable debuff.

data.name: BRD_Adv_Troubadour_Desc
data.value: Adds Troubador when Raidwide is detected casting.

data.name: BRD_Adv_NaturesMinne_Desc
data.value: Adds Nature's Minne when Raidwide is detected casting and you don't already have Troubadour up.

data.name: BRD_AoE_AdvMode_Desc
data.value: Replaces Quick Nock with a full one-button AoE rotation. These features are ideal if you want to customize the rotation.

data.name: BRD_AoE_Adv_Multidot_Desc
data.value: Will maintain dots on up to 3 targets.

data.name: BRD_AoE_Adv_Songs_Desc
data.value: Weave Songs on the Advanced AoE.

data.name: BRD_AoE_Adv_Buffs_Desc
data.value: Adds buffs onto the Advance AoE Bard feature. Enable all to follow balance buff windows Disabling any buff will follow simple priority

data.name: BRD_AoE_Adv_oGCD_Desc
data.value: Weave Sidewinder, Empyreal arrow, Rain of death, and Pitch perfect when available.

data.name: BRD_AoE_Pooling_Desc
data.value: Pools Rain of death charges to allow for optimum burst phases.

data.name: BRD_AoE_ApexPooling_Desc
data.value: Pools Apex arrow into buff window and when buffs are between 50-60 seconds on cd.

data.name: BRD_AoE_Adv_Interrupt_Desc
data.value: Uses interrupt during the rotation if applicable.

data.name: BRD_AoE_BuffsEncore_Desc
data.value: Adds Radiant Encore to the Rotation after Finale.

data.name: BRD_AoE_BuffsResonant_Desc
data.value: Adds Resonant Arrow to the Rotation after Barrage.

data.name: BRD_AoE_ApexArrow_Desc
data.value: Adds Apex Arrow and Blast shot

data.name: BRD_AoE_SecondWind_Desc
data.value: Uses Second Wind when below set HP percentage.

data.name: BRD_AoE_Wardens_Desc
data.value: Uses Wardens Paeon when you have a cleansable debuff.

data.name: BRD_StraightShotUpgrade_Desc
data.value: Straight Shot/Refulgent Arrow with Heavy Shot when not procced.

data.name: BRD_StraightShotUpgrade_OGCDs_Desc
data.value: Will use the following OGCDs to prevent overcap

data.name: BRD_DoTMaintainance_Desc
data.value: Will apply and refresh your dots.

data.name: BRD_IronJaws_Desc
data.value: Iron Jaws is replaced with Caustic Bite/Stormbite if one or both are not up. Alternates between the two if Iron Jaws isn't available.

data.name: BRD_WideVolleyUpgrade_Desc
data.value: Replaces WideVolley/Shadowbite with Quicknock/LadonsBite when not procced or below level.

data.name: BRD_WideVolleyUpgrade_OGCDs_Desc
data.value: Will use the following OGCDs to prevent overcap

data.name: BRD_WideVolleyUpgrade_Apex_Desc
data.value: Replaces WideVolley/Shadowbite with Apex Arrow when gauge is full and Blast Arrow when you are Blast Arrow ready.

data.name: BRD_ST_oGCD_Songs_Desc
data.value: Adds the songs to the oGCD feature. Wanderers > Mages > Armys

data.name: BRD_AoE_oGCD_Desc
data.value: All AoE oGCD's on Rain of Death depending on their CD.

data.name: BRD_AoE_oGCD_Songs_Desc
data.value: Adds the songs to the AoE oGCD feature. Wanderers > Mages > Armys

data.name: BRD_Buffs_Desc
data.value: Adds Raging Strikes and Battle Voice onto Barrage.

data.name: BRD_OneButtonSongs_Desc
data.value: Add Mage's Ballad and Army's Paeon to Wanderer's Minuet depending on cooldowns.

data.name: BRD_OneButtonDots_Desc
data.value: Replaces Venomous Bite/Caustic Bite with Windbite/Stormbite if target is missing that DoT.

data.name: BRD_OneButtonDots_IronJaws_Desc
data.value: If both DoTs are applied, returns Iron Jaws if able to be used.

data.name: BRD_OneButtonDots_Retargeted_Desc
data.value: Will apply DoTs to as many targets you're in combat with as possible.

data.name: BRD_OneButtonDots_SavageBlade_Desc
data.value: If nothing is left to DoT or refresh within 5s, lockout with Savage Blade

data.name: BRD_Hidden_Song_Extension_Desc
data.value: Will extend your Army's Paeon to 3 seconds left on it's timer. For longer burst holds without dropping songs.

data.name: DNC_ST_BlockFinishes_Name
data.value: Require Nearby Enemy for Finishes Feature

data.name: DNC_ST_BlockFinishes_Desc
data.value: Will hold Standard Finish and Technical Finish until an enemy is within range of the abilities in all (non-Simple) Modes and Features below by replacing whatever button with Savage Blade. Will show either Finish when the dance is about to expire. This behavior is recommended by The Balance but can introduce drift, so it may not be what is best for your group.

data.name: DNC_ST_SimpleMode_Desc
data.value: Replaces Cascade with a full one-button single target rotation. Employs the Forced Triple Weave Anti-Drift solution.

data.name: DNC_AoE_SimpleMode_Desc
data.value: Replaces Windmill with a full one-button AoE rotation.

data.name: DNC_ST_AdvancedMode_Desc
data.value: Replaces Cascade with a full one-button single target rotation. This mode is ideal if you want to customize the rotation.

data.name: DNC_ST_BalanceOpener_Desc
data.value: Adds the Balance opener at level 100. Requirements: - Standard Step ready - Technical Step ready - Devilment ready (Will change to Savage Blade to wait for the countdown) (REQUIRES a countdown)

data.name: DNC_ST_Opener_BlockEarly_Desc
data.value: When not in combat will change to Savage Blade to wait for a countdown to appear. Mostly here to allow for targeting the boss before the exact countdown window your opener selection is waiting for. ONLY designed to be something you turn on while doing back-to-back pulls of content, NOT suitable to leave on all the time.

data.name: DNC_ST_Adv_Partner_Desc
data.value: Includes Closed Position when out of combat and you do not have a dance partner.

data.name: DNC_ST_Adv_PartnerAuto_Desc
data.value: Will Retarget the Closed Position shown out of combat to your optimal partner.

data.name: DNC_ST_Adv_AutoPartner_Desc
data.value: Includes Ending and then Closed Position in the rotation when your current partner is not the optimal one, such as when they get a damage down.

data.name: DNC_ST_Adv_Peloton_Desc
data.value: Uses Peloton when you are out of combat, do not already have the Peloton buff and are performing Standard Step with greater than 5s remaining of your dance.

data.name: DNC_ST_Adv_Interrupt_Desc
data.value: Includes an interrupt in the rotation (if applicable to your current target).

data.name: DNC_ST_Adv_SS_Desc
data.value: Include all dance steps, and Finish, and optionally Standard Step, in the rotation.

data.name: DNC_ST_Adv_FM_Desc
data.value: Includes Finishing Move in the rotation.

data.name: DNC_ST_Adv_SS_Prepull_Desc
data.value: Starts Standard Step (and steps) before combat. (Already included in The Balance Opener).

data.name: DNC_ST_Adv_TS_Desc
data.value: Include all dance steps, and Finish, and optionally Technical Step, in the rotation.

data.name: DNC_ST_Adv_Devilment_Desc
data.value: Includes Devilment in the rotation. Will activate only during Technical Finish if you're Lv70 or above. Will be used on cooldown below Lv70.

data.name: DNC_ST_Adv_FanProccs_Desc
data.value: Options for including Fan Dance 3 and 4 into the rotation. Note: If using the Forced Triple Weave option, FD3&4 will be used regardless of these options.

data.name: DNC_ST_Adv_FanProcc3_Desc
data.value: Includes Fan Dance 3 when under Threefold Fan Dance.

data.name: DNC_ST_Adv_FanProcc4_Desc
data.value: Includes Fan Dance 4 when under Fourfold Fan Dance.

data.name: DNC_ST_Adv_Feathers_Desc
data.value: Expends a feather in the next available weave window when capped and under the effect of Flourishing Symmetry or Flourishing Flow. Weaves feathers where possible during Technical Finish. Weaves feathers outside of burst when target is below set HP percentage (Set to 0 to disable). Weaves feathers whenever available when under Lv.70.

data.name: DNC_ST_Adv_Improvisation_Desc
data.value: Includes Improvisation in the rotation when available. Will not use while under Technical Finish

data.name: DNC_ST_Adv_SaberDance_Desc
data.value: Includes Saber Dance in the rotation when at or over the Esprit threshold. (And to prevent overcapping while under Technical Finish)

data.name: DNC_ST_Adv_DawnDance_Desc
data.value: Includes Dance of the Dawn in the rotation after Saber Dance and when over the threshold, or in the final seconds of Dance of the Dawn ready.

data.name: DNC_ST_Adv_LD_Desc
data.value: Includes Last Dance in the rotation.

data.name: DNC_ST_Adv_PanicHeals_Desc
data.value: Includes Curing Waltz and Second Wind in the rotation when available and your HP is below the set percentages.

data.name: DNC_ST_Adv_ShieldSamba_Desc
data.value: Adds Shield Samba when Raidwide is detected casting.

data.name: DNC_AoE_AdvancedMode_Desc
data.value: Replaces Windmill with a full one-button AoE rotation. This mode is ideal if you want to customize the rotation.

data.name: DNC_AoE_Adv_Partner_Desc
data.value: Includes Closed Position when out of combat and no dance partner is found.

data.name: DNC_AoE_Adv_Interrupt_Desc
data.value: Includes an interrupt in the AoE rotation (if your current target can be interrupted).

data.name: DNC_AoE_Adv_SS_Desc
data.value: Include all dance steps, and Finish, and optionally Standard Step, in the AoE rotation.

data.name: DNC_AoE_Adv_FM_Desc
data.value: Includes Finishing Move in the AoE rotation.

data.name: DNC_AoE_Adv_TS_Desc
data.value: Include all dance steps, and Finish, and optionally Technical Step, in the AoE rotation.

data.name: DNC_AoE_Adv_Devilment_Desc
data.value: Includes Devilment in the AoE rotation. Will activate only during Technical Finish if you're Lv70 or above. Will be used on cooldown below Lv70.

data.name: DNC_AoE_Adv_Flourish_Desc
data.value: Includes Flourish in the AoE rotation.

data.name: DNC_AoE_Adv_FanProccs_Desc
data.value: Options for including Fan Dance 3 and 4 into the rotation.

data.name: DNC_AoE_Adv_FanProcc3_Desc
data.value: Includes Fan Dance 3 when under Threefold Fan Dance.

data.name: DNC_AoE_Adv_FanProcc4_Desc
data.value: Includes Fan Dance 4 when under Fourfold Fan Dance.

data.name: DNC_AoE_Adv_Feathers_Desc
data.value: Expends a feather in the next available weave window when capped and under the effect of Flourishing Symmetry or Flourishing Flow. Weaves feathers where possible during Technical Finish. Weaves feathers whenever available when under Lv.70.

data.name: DNC_AoE_Adv_Improvisation_Desc
data.value: Includes Improvisation in the AoE rotation when available. Will not use while under Technical Finish

data.name: DNC_AoE_Adv_SaberDance_Desc
data.value: Includes Saber Dance in the AoE rotation when at or over the Esprit threshold. (And to prevent overcapping while under Technical Finish)

data.name: DNC_AoE_Adv_DawnDance_Desc
data.value: Includes Dance of the Dawn in the AoE rotation after Saber Dance and when over the threshold, or in the final seconds of Dance of the Dawn ready.

data.name: DNC_AoE_Adv_LD_Desc
data.value: Includes Last Dance in the rotation.

data.name: DNC_AoE_Adv_PanicHeals_Desc
data.value: Includes Curing Waltz and Second Wind in the AoE rotation when available and your HP is below the set percentages.

data.name: DNC_ST_BasicCombo_Desc
data.value: Replace Fountain with its combo chain.

data.name: DNC_ST_MultiButton_Desc
data.value: Single target combo with Fan Dances and Esprit use.

data.name: DNC_ST_EspritOvercap_Desc
data.value: Adds Saber Dance above the set Esprit threshold.

data.name: DNC_ST_FanDanceOvercap_Desc
data.value: Adds Fan Dance 1 when Fourfold Feathers are full.

data.name: DNC_AoE_MultiButton_Desc
data.value: AoE combo with Fan Dances and Esprit use.

data.name: DNC_AoE_EspritOvercap_Desc
data.value: Adds Saber Dance above the set Esprit threshold.

data.name: DNC_AoE_FanDanceOvercap_Name
data.value: AoE Fan Dance Overcap Protection Option

data.name: DNC_AoE_FanDanceOvercap_Desc
data.value: Adds Fan Dance 2 when Fourfold Feathers are full.

data.name: DNC_DesirablePartner_Name
data.value: Dance Partner on Desirable Partner Feature

data.name: DNC_DesirablePartner_Desc
data.value: Replaces Closed Position with itself, but targeted to a party member, so you can cast it without having to pick anyone and without having to actually target anyone. Will show Ending when your current Partner is no longer the best choice.

data.name: DNC_CustomDanceSteps_Desc
data.value: Change custom actions into dance steps while dancing. Lets you still dance with combos on, without using Step Combo Features above.

data.name: DNC_CustomDanceSteps_Conflicts_Desc
data.value: If enabled, will let you choose actions that are replaced by the smaller features listed below here, and they will return the Step that you have set them to when dancing.

data.name: DNC_DanceFeatures_Desc
data.value: Small Features for Standard and Technical Step

data.name: DNC_StandardStepCombo_Desc
data.value: Change Standard Step into each dance step, while dancing.

data.name: DNC_StandardStep_LastDance_Name
data.value: Standard Step to Last Dance Feature

data.name: DNC_StandardStep_LastDance_Desc
data.value: Change Standard Step or Finishing Move to Last Dance when available.

data.name: DNC_TechnicalStepCombo_Desc
data.value: Change Technical Step into each dance step, while dancing.

data.name: DNC_TechnicalStep_Devilment_Desc
data.value: Change Technical Step to Devilment as soon as possible.

data.name: DNC_FlourishingFanDances_Desc
data.value: Replace Flourish with Fan Dance 4 during weave-windows, when Flourish is on cooldown.

data.name: DNC_FanDanceCombos_Desc
data.value: Options for Fan Dance combos. Fan Dance 3 takes priority over Fan Dance 4.

data.name: DNC_FanDance_1to3_Combo_Desc
data.value: Changes Fan Dance 1 to Fan Dance 3 when available.

data.name: DNC_FanDance_1to4_Combo_Desc
data.value: Changes Fan Dance 1 to Fan Dance 4 when available.

data.name: DNC_FanDance_2to3_Combo_Desc
data.value: Changes Fan Dance 2 to Fan Dance 3 when available.

data.name: DNC_FanDance_2to4_Combo_Desc
data.value: Changes Fan Dance 2 to Fan Dance 4 when available.

data.name: DNC_Procc_Bladeshower_Desc
data.value: Change Bladeshower to Bloodshower when available.

data.name: DNC_Procc_Windmill_Desc
data.value: Change Windmill to Rising Windmill when available.

data.name: DRK_ST_Simple_Desc
data.value: Replaces Hard Slash with a full one-button single target rotation.

data.name: DRK_AoE_Simple_Desc
data.value: Replaces Unleash with a full one-button AoE rotation.

data.name: DRK_ST_Adv_Desc
data.value: Replaces Hard Slash with a full one-button single target rotation. These features are ideal if you want to customize the rotation.

data.name: DRK_ST_BalanceOpener_Desc
data.value: Adds the Balance opener at level 100. Requirements: - Over 7,000 mana - 2 Shadowbringer charges ready - Living Shadow off cooldown - Delirium off cooldown - Carve and Spit off cooldown - Salted Earth off cooldown (supports TBN'ing during use or pre-pull)

data.name: DRK_ST_RangedUptime_Desc
data.value: Adds Unmend to the rotation when you are out of range.

data.name: DRK_ST_CDs_Desc
data.value: Collection of cooldowns to add to the rotation.

data.name: DRK_ST_CD_Interrupt_Desc
data.value: Adds Interject to the rotation when your target's cast is interruptible.

data.name: DRK_ST_CD_Stun_Desc
data.value: Adds Low Blow to the rotation when your target is casting. Not advised outside of overworld content, as it can waste a lot of Low Blows on un-stun-able enemies, etc. Will try to not use it in boss fights.

data.name: DRK_ST_CD_Delirium_Desc
data.value: Adds Delirium (or Blood Weapon at lower levels) to the rotation on cooldown and when Darkside is up. Will also spend 50 blood gauge if Delirium is nearly ready to protect from overcap.

data.name: DRK_ST_CD_Shadow_Desc
data.value: Adds Living Shadow to the rotation when Darkside is up.

data.name: DRK_ST_CD_Disesteem_Desc
data.value: Adds Disesteem to the rotation when available.

data.name: DRK_ST_CD_Bringer_Desc
data.value: Adds Shadowbringer to the rotation while Darkside is up. Will use all stacks on cooldown.

data.name: DRK_ST_CD_BringerBurst_Desc
data.value: Pools Shadowbringer to use during even minute window bursts (after Disesteem).

data.name: DRK_ST_CD_Salt_Desc
data.value: Adds Salted Earth to the rotation while Darkside is up, will use Salt and Darkness if unlocked.

data.name: DRK_ST_CD_Darkness_Desc
data.value: Adds Salt and Darkness to the rotation in the latter half of its duration.

data.name: DRK_ST_CD_Spit_Desc
data.value: Adds Carve and Spit to the rotation while Darkside is up.

data.name: DRK_ST_Spenders_Desc
data.value: Collection of spenders (mana and blood) to add to the rotation.

data.name: DRK_ST_Sp_ScarletChain_Desc
data.value: Adds the Scarlet Delirium combo chain to the rotation when Delirium is activated.

data.name: DRK_ST_Sp_Bloodspiller_Desc
data.value: Adds Bloodspiller to the rotation when under Delirium, or just after Burst.

data.name: DRK_ST_Sp_BloodOvercap_Desc
data.value: Adds Bloodspiller to the rotation before Souleater when the blood gauge is above the chosen threshold.

data.name: DRK_ST_Sp_Edge_Desc
data.value: Uses Edge of Darkness in burst windows.

data.name: DRK_ST_Sp_DarkArts_Desc
data.value: Will spend Dark Arts if your own The Blackest Night shield is active on you, except when saving for burst.

data.name: DRK_ST_Sp_EdgeDarkside_Desc
data.value: Uses Edge of Darkness if Darkside is about to expire (<10s).

data.name: DRK_ST_Sp_ManaOvercap_Desc
data.value: Uses Edge of Darkness if you are at or above 9,400 mana, except when saving for burst.

data.name: DRK_AoE_Adv_Desc
data.value: Replaces Unleash with a full one-button AoE rotation. These features are ideal if you want to customize the rotation.

data.name: DRK_AoE_CDs_Desc
data.value: Collection of cooldowns to add to the rotation.

data.name: DRK_AoE_Interrupt_Desc
data.value: Adds Interject to the rotation when your target's cast is interruptible.

data.name: DRK_AoE_Stun_Desc
data.value: Adds Low Blow to the rotation when your target is casting.

data.name: DRK_AoE_CD_Delirium_Desc
data.value: Adds Delirium (or Blood Weapon at lower levels) to the rotation on cooldown and when Darkside is up.

data.name: DRK_AoE_CD_Shadow_Desc
data.value: Adds Living Shadow to the rotation on cooldown and when Darkside is up.

data.name: DRK_AoE_CD_Disesteem_Desc
data.value: Adds Disesteem to the rotation when available.

data.name: DRK_AoE_CD_Salt_Desc
data.value: Adds Salted Earth and Salt and Darkness to the rotation on cooldown and when Darkside is up.

data.name: DRK_AoE_CD_SaltStill_Desc
data.value: Requires to be at a stand-still and for combat to have been going on for >7 seconds to use Salted Earth, to try to make it be placed after you finish your pull.

data.name: DRK_AoE_CD_Drain_Desc
data.value: Adds Abyssal Drain to the rotation when you fall below the chosen HP.

data.name: DRK_AoE_Spenders_Desc
data.value: Collection of spenders (mana and blood) to add to the rotation.

data.name: DRK_AoE_Sp_ImpalementChain_Desc
data.value: Adds Impalement to the rotation when Delirium is active.

data.name: DRK_AoE_Sp_Quietus_Desc
data.value: Adds Quietus to the rotation when under Delirium, or just after Burst..

data.name: DRK_AoE_Sp_BloodOvercap_Desc
data.value: Adds Quietus to the rotation when the blood gauge is above the chosen threshold.

data.name: DRK_AoE_Sp_Flood_Desc
data.value: Uses Flood of Shadow in burst, if Darkside is about to expire (<10s), if you have Dark Arts and use The Blackest Night, and outside of burst will spend to chosen MP limit.

data.name: DRK_AoE_Sp_ManaOvercap_Desc
data.value: Uses Flood of Shadow if you are above 9,400 mana.

data.name: DRK_Mitigation_Desc
data.value: Options for Advanced Combos' In-Combo Mitigation. Enable Mitigation in each Advanced Combo to use these options. (Simple Mode does not use these Options, instead Recommended Values in place of them)

data.name: DRK_Mitigation_NonBoss_Desc
data.value: Adds Mitigation to the combos when not in a boss encounter. Will not overlap separate options unless stated. Will not use mitigation in the first 15 seconds of a pull unless you are not moving.

data.name: DRK_Mitigation_NonBoss_BlackestNight_Desc
data.value: Adds The Blackest Night when available. Will overlap with others.

data.name: DRK_Mitigation_NonBoss_LivingDead_Desc
data.value: Adds Living Dead based on set health threshold.

data.name: DRK_Mitigation_NonBoss_Rampart_Desc
data.value: Adds Rampart when 3 or more targets.

data.name: DRK_Mitigation_NonBoss_DarkMind_Desc
data.value: Adds Dark Mind when 3 or more targets.

data.name: DRK_Mitigation_NonBoss_ShadowWall_Desc
data.value: Adds Shadow Wall/Shadowed Vigil when 5 or more targets.

data.name: DRK_Mitigation_NonBoss_ArmsLength_Desc
data.value: Adds Arm's Length when 5 or more targets.

data.name: DRK_Mitigation_NonBoss_Reprisal_Desc
data.value: Adds Reprisal when 5 or more targets.

data.name: DRK_Mitigation_NonBoss_DarkMissionary_Desc
data.value: Adds Dark Missionary when 5 or more targets. Will overlap with others.

data.name: DRK_Mitigation_NonBoss_Oblation_Desc
data.value: Adds Oblation when 5 or more targets. Will overlap with others.

data.name: DRK_Mitigation_Boss_Desc
data.value: Adds Mitigation to the combos when in a boss encounter.

data.name: DRK_Mitigation_Boss_BlackestNight_OnCD_Desc
data.value: Adds The Blackest Night when below HP threshold and targeted.

data.name: DRK_Mitigation_Boss_BlackestNight_TB_Desc
data.value: Adds The Blackest Night when an incoming tankbuster is detected.

data.name: DRK_Mitigation_Boss_Oblation_Desc
data.value: Adds Oblation when an incoming tankbuster is detected.

data.name: DRK_Mitigation_Boss_Rampart_Desc
data.value: Adds Rampart when an incoming tankbuster is detected. Will Not Overlap with Shadow Wall/Shadowed Vigil.

data.name: DRK_Mitigation_Boss_ShadowWall_Desc
data.value: Adds Shadow Wall/Shadowed Vigil when an incoming tankbuster is detected. Will not overlap with Rampart.

data.name: DRK_Mitigation_Boss_DarkMind_Desc
data.value: Adds Dark Mind when an incoming tankbuster is detected. Will not overlap unless below set threshold or aligned with rampart.

data.name: DRK_Mitigation_Boss_Reprisal_Desc
data.value: Adds Reprisal when raidwide casting is detected.

data.name: DRK_Mitigation_Boss_DarkMissionary_Desc
data.value: Adds Dark Missionary when raidwide casting is detected.

data.name: DRK_ST_BasicCombo_Desc
data.value: Replace Souleater with its combo chain.

data.name: DRK_AoE_BasicCombo_Desc
data.value: Replace Stalwart Soul with its combo chain.

data.name: DRK_Mit_OneButton_Desc
data.value: Replaces Dark Mind with an all-in-one mitigation button.

data.name: DRK_Mit_LivingDead_Max_Desc
data.value: Gives max priority to Living Dead when the Health percentage threshold is met.

data.name: DRK_Mit_TheBlackestNight_Desc
data.value: Adds The Blackest Night to the one-button mitigation.

data.name: DRK_Mit_Oblation_Desc
data.value: Adds Oblation to the one-button mitigation.

data.name: DRK_Mit_Reprisal_Desc
data.value: Adds Reprisal to the one-button mitigation. NOTE: Will not use unless there is a target within range to prevent waste.

data.name: DRK_Mit_DarkMissionary_Desc
data.value: Adds Dark Missionary to the one-button mitigation.

data.name: DRK_Mit_Rampart_Desc
data.value: Adds Rampart to the one-button mitigation.

data.name: DRK_Mit_DarkMind_Desc
data.value: Adds Dark Mind to the one-button mitigation. NOTE: even if disabled, will still try to use Dark Mind as the lowest priority.

data.name: DRK_Mit_ArmsLength_Desc
data.value: Adds Arm's Length to the one-button mitigation.

data.name: DRK_Mit_ShadowWall_Desc
data.value: Adds Shadow Wall / Vigil to the one-button mitigation.

data.name: DRK_Mit_Party_Desc
data.value: Replaces Dark Missionary with Reprisal when ready.

data.name: DRK_oGCD_Desc
data.value: Adds selected oGCD abilities to Carve And Spit and Abyssal Drain.

data.name: DRK_oGCD_Interrupt_Desc
data.value: Adds Interject to the feature when your target's cast is interruptible.

data.name: DRK_oGCD_Delirium_Desc
data.value: Adds Delirium (or Blood Weapon) to the Feature.

data.name: DRK_oGCD_Shadow_Desc
data.value: Adds Living Shadow to the Feature.

data.name: DRK_oGCD_SaltedEarth_Desc
data.value: Adds Salted Earth to the Feature.

data.name: DRK_oGCD_SaltAndDarkness_Desc
data.value: Adds Saltand Darkness to the Feature when under the effect of Salted Earth.

data.name: DRK_Retarget_TBN_Desc
data.value: Will Retarget The Blackest Night outside of other combos to your MouseOver Target (or a friendly Hard Target).

data.name: DRK_Retarget_TBN_TT_Desc
data.value: If your target's target is not you, will Retarget The Blackest Night onto them. (if you're not top aggro, and not mousing over or hard targeting an ally)

data.name: DRK_Retarget_Oblation_Desc
data.value: Will Retarget Oblation outside of other combos to your MouseOver Target (or a friendly Hard Target).

data.name: DRK_Retarget_Oblation_TT_Desc
data.value: If your target's target is not you, will Retarget Oblation onto them. (if you're not top aggro, and not mousing over or hard targeting an ally)

data.name: DRK_Retarget_Oblation_DoubleProtection_Desc
data.value: Will change Oblation to Savage Blade when your target already has Oblation on them.

data.name: DRK_RetargetShadowstride_Desc
data.value: Will retarget Shadowstride to your field or UI mouseover target (If Hostile) or the nearest hostile target to your mouseover target (If friendly).

data.name: DRK_Hidden_Desc
data.value: Collection of cheeky or encounter-specific extra options only available to those in the know. Do not expect these options to be maintained, or even kept, after they are no longer Current.

data.name: DRG_ST_SimpleMode_Desc
data.value: Replaces True Thrust with a full one-button single target rotation. This is the ideal option for newcomers to the job.

data.name: DRG_AoE_SimpleMode_Desc
data.value: Replaces Doom Spike with a full one-button AoE rotation. This is the ideal option for newcomers to the job.

data.name: DRG_ST_AdvancedMode_Desc
data.value: Replaces True Thrust with a full one-button single target rotation. These features are ideal if you want to customize the rotation.

data.name: DRG_ST_Opener_Desc
data.value: Adds the Balance opener at level 100.

data.name: DRG_ST_Buffs_Desc
data.value: Adds various buffs to the rotation.

data.name: DRG_ST_BattleLitany_Desc
data.value: Adds Battle Litany to the rotation.

data.name: DRG_ST_LanceCharge_Desc
data.value: Adds Lance Charge to the rotation.

data.name: DRG_ST_LifeSurge_Desc
data.value: Adds Life Surge, on the proper GCD, to the rotation.

data.name: DRG_ST_Damage_Desc
data.value: Collection of Damage skills on main combo.

data.name: DRG_ST_Mirage_Desc
data.value: Adds Mirage Dive to the rotation.

data.name: DRG_ST_Wyrmwind_Desc

data.name: DRG_ST_StunInterupt_Desc
data.value: Adds Leg Sweep when target non-boss is casting.

data.name: DRG_ST_ComboHeals_Desc
data.value: Adds Bloodbath and Second Wind to the rotation.

data.name: DRG_ST_Feint_Desc
data.value: Adds Feint when Raidwide is detected casting.

data.name: DRG_AoE_AdvancedMode_Desc

data.value: Adds Rise of the Dragon to the rotation.

data.value: Adds Low Blow to the rotation when your target is casting. Not advised outside of overworld content, as it can waste a lot of Low Blows on un-stun-able enemies, etc. Will try to not use it in boss fights.

data.name: MCH_ST_SimpleMode_Desc
data.value: Replaces Split Shot with a full one-button single target rotation. This is the ideal option for newcomers to the job.

data.name: MCH_AoE_SimpleMode_Desc
data.value: Replaces Spreadshot with a full one-button AoE rotation. This is the ideal option for newcomers to the job. Will lock out input to keep Flamethrower going by replacing Spreadshot with Savage Blade.

data.name: MCH_ST_AdvancedMode_Desc
data.value: Replaces Split Shot with a full one-button single target rotation. These features are ideal if you want to customize the rotation.

data.name: MCH_ST_Adv_Opener_Desc
data.value: Adds the Balance opener at lvl 90/100.

data.value: Gauss Round / Ricochet Double Check / Checkmate option

data.name: MCH_ST_Adv_GaussRicochet_Desc
data.value: Adds Gauss Round and Ricochet or Double Check and Checkmate to the rotation. Will prevent overcapping.

data.name: MCH_ST_Adv_Reassemble_Desc

data.name: PLD_ST_LowBlow_Desc
data.value: Adds Low Blow to the rotation when your target is casting. Not advised outside of overworld content, as it can waste a lot of Low Blows on un-stun-able enemies, etc. Will try to not use it in boss fights.

data.name: PLD_ST_ShieldBash_Desc
data.value: Adds Shield Bash to the rotation when your target is casting. Not advised outside of overworld content, as it can waste a lot of GCDs on un-stun-able enemies, etc. Will try to not use it in boss fights.

data.name: PLD_ST_AdvancedMode_FoF_Desc
data.value: Adds Fight or Flight to Advanced Mode. - Uses after Royal Authority during opener. - Afterward, on cooldown alongside Requiescat. - Target HP must be at or above:

data.value: Adds Shield Lob to Advanced Mode. - Uses only while out of melee range. - Will not override better actions.

data.name: PLD_ST_AdvancedMode_CircleOfScorn_Desc

data.name: PLD_Mitigation_NonBoss_Desc
data.value: Adds Mitigation to the combos when not in a boss encounter. Will not overlap separate options unless stated. Will not use mitigation in the first 15 seconds of a pull unless you are not moving.

data.name: PLD_Mitigation_NonBoss_HallowedGroundEmergency_Desc

data.name: PLD_BlockForWings_Name

data.name: PLD_BlockForWings_Desc
data.value: Will block the main Combos with Savage Blade while Passage of Arms is still active, to prevent actions from those combos cancelling Passage of Arms early. This will leave it up to you to cancel Passage of Arms via other actions or movement (or letting it be used fully).

data.name: PLD_ST_BasicCombo_Desc

data.name: PLD_AoE_BasicCombo_Desc

data.value: Gives max priority to Hallowed Ground when the Health percentage threshold is met.

data.name: PLD_Mit_Sheltron_Desc

data.name: PLD_Mit_Reprisal_Desc

data.name: PLD_Mit_DivineVeil_Desc
data.value: Adds Divine Veil to the one-button mitigation.

data.name: PLD_Mit_Rampart_Desc

data.name: PLD_Mit_Bulwark_Desc
data.value: Adds Bulwark to the one-button mitigation. NOTE: even if disabled, will still try to use Bulwark as the lowest priority.

data.name: PLD_Mit_ArmsLength_Desc
data.value: Adds Arm's Length to the one-button mitigation.

data.name: PLD_Mit_Sentinel_Desc
data.value: Adds Sentinel / Guardian to the one-button mitigation.

data.name: PLD_Mit_Clemency_Desc

data.name: PLD_Mit_Party_Desc
data.value: Replaces Divine Veil with Reprisal when ready.

data.name: PLD_Mit_Party_Wings_Desc
data.value: Includes Passage of Arms when both Divine Veil and Reprisal are on cooldown.

data.name: PLD_Requiescat_Options_Desc
data.value: Replaces Requiescat with all Requiescat-related actions. - Prioritizes Confiteor and Blade actions when available. - Uses Holy Spirit or Holy Circle when appropriate.

data.name: PLD_SpiritsWithin_Desc
data.value: Replaces Spirits Within with Circle of Scorn when available.

data.name: PLD_ShieldLob_Feature_Desc
data.value: Replaces Shield Lob with Holy Spirit when available. - Must be under the effect of Divine Might or not moving.

data.name: PLD_RetargetClemency_Desc
data.value: Will retarget Clemency according to following Suboptions

data.name: PLD_RetargetClemency_MO_Desc
data.value: Adds UI mouseover to the priority. Above LowHP option.

data.name: PLD_RetargetClemency_LowHP_Desc
data.value: Will Heal Lowest Health Party member until you fall below set threshold

data.name: PLD_RetargetSheltron_Desc
data.value: Will use intervention on your Hard Target if target is a friendly party member, if not then Sheltron. - UI Mouseover > Hard target > Target's target > Self Sheltron

data.name: PLD_RetargetSheltron_MO_Desc
data.value: Adds UI mouseover to the priority.

data.name: PLD_RetargetSheltron_TT_Desc
data.value: Adds Target's Target to the priority when you do not have agro.

data.name: PLD_RetargetShieldBash_Desc
data.value: Redirects your Shield Bash to a stunnable enemy if your current target cannot be stunned.

data.name: PLD_RetargetCover_Desc
data.value: Will retarget Cover according to the following options

data.name: PLD_RetargetCover_MO_Desc
data.value: Adds UI mouseover to the priority, above Low HP option in priority.

data.name: PLD_RetargetCover_LowHP_Desc
data.value: Will Cover the Lowest Health (by percentage) Party member when they fall below set threshold

data.name: PLD_RetargetIntervene_Desc
data.value: Will retarget intervene to your field or UI mouseover target (If Hostile) or the nearest hostile target to your mouseover target (If friendly).

data.name: RDM_ST_SimpleMode_Desc
data.value: Replaces Jolt with a full one-button single target rotation. This is the ideal option for newcomers to the job. To start the melee combo, you must be within melee range.

data.name: RDM_AoE_SimpleMode_Desc
data.value: Replaces Scatter with a full one-button AoE rotation. This is the ideal option for newcomers to the job. To start the melee combo, you must be within melee range.

data.name: RDM_ST_DPS_Desc
data.value: Replaces Jolt with a full one-button single target rotation. These features are ideal if you want to customize the rotation.

data.value: Adds the Balance opener at level 100. Ensure your opener timeout setting is higher than your Veraero III cast time!!! **Standard Opener must move into melee range to use Corps/Engagement**

data.name: RDM_ST_MeleeCombo_GapCloser_Desc
data.value: Use Corp-a-corps when out of melee range and you have enough mana to start the melee combo.

data.name: RDM_ST_MeleeCombo_MeleeCheck_Desc
data.value: Once the melee combo has started, don't switch away even if target is out of range.

data.value: Add Manafication before Embolden for burst.

data.value: Prevents overcap but pools at least one charge for burst window.

data.value: Will hold one charge for manual displacement usage.

data.name: RDM_ST_Corpsacorps_Desc

data.name: SAM_ST_CDs_UseTsubame_Desc

data.name: SAM_ST_CDs_Iaijutsu_Movement_Desc

data.name: SAM_ST_RangedUptime_Desc

data.name: SAM_ST_TrueNorth_Desc

data.name: SAM_ST_StunInterupt_Desc

data.name: SAM_ST_ComboHeals_Desc
data.value: Adds Bloodbath and Second Wind to the combo, using them when below the HP Percentage threshold.

data.name: SAM_ST_Feint_Desc
data.value: Adds Feint when Raidwide is detected casting.

data.name: SAM_ST_ThirdEye_Desc
data.value: Adds Third Eye when Raidwide is detected casting. When Solo, uses on cd.

data.name: SAM_ST_Meditate_Desc
data.value: Adds Meditate when not moving, not having a target and being in combat.

data.name: SAM_Hidden_Desc
data.value: Collection of cheeky or encounter-specific extra options only available to those in the know. Do not expect these options to be maintained, or even kept, after they are no longer Current.

data.name: SCH_ST_Simple_DPS_Desc
data.value: Replaces Ruin I / Broils with a full one-button single target rotation. This is the ideal option for newcomers to the job.

data.name: SCH_AoE_Simple_DPS_Desc
data.value: Replaces Art of War with a full one-button AoE rotation. This is the ideal option for newcomers to the job.

data.name: SCH_Simple_ST_Heal_Desc
data.value: Replaces Physick with a full one-button single target healing utility. This is the ideal option for newcomers to the job. Particularly with autorotation.

data.name: SCH_Simple_AoE_Heal_Desc
data.value: Replaces Succor with a full one-button AoE healing utility. This is the ideal option for newcomers to the job. Particularly with autorotation.

data.name: SCH_ST_ADV_DPS_Desc
data.value: Replaces Ruin I / Broils with options below.

data.name: SCH_ST_ADV_DPS_Balance_Opener_Desc
data.value: Adds the Balance opener at level 100.

data.name: SCH_ST_ADV_DPS_Aetherflow_Desc
data.value: Use Aetherflow when out of Aetherflow stacks.

data.name: SCH_ST_ADV_DPS_EnergyDrain_Desc
data.value: Use Energy Drain to consume remaining Aetherflow stacks when Aetherflow is about to come off cooldown.

data.name: SCH_ST_ADV_DPS_ChainStrat_Desc
data.value: Adds Chain Stratagem on cooldown with overlap protection

data.name: SCH_ST_ADV_DPS_Ruin2Movement_Desc
data.value: Use Ruin II when you have to move.

data.name: SCH_ST_ADV_DPS_FairyReminder_Desc
data.value: Adds Summon Eos whenever you've not summoned your fairy.

data.name: SCH_ST_ADV_DPS_Lucid_Desc
data.value: Adds Lucid Dreaming when MP drops below slider value:

data.name: SCH_AoE_ADV_DPS_Desc

data.value: Use Energy Drain to consume remaining Aetherflow stacks when Aetherflow is about to come off cooldown.

data.value: Adds Chain Stratagem on cooldown with overlap protection

data.name: SCH_AoE_ADV_DPS_FairyReminder_Desc
data.value: Adds Summon Eos whenever you've not summoned your fairy.

data.value: Adds Lucid Dreaming when MP drops below slider value:

data.name: SCH_AoE_ADV_DPS_Aetherflow_Desc
data.value: Use Aetherflow when out of Aetherflow stacks.

data.name: SCH_ST_Heal_Desc
data.value: Change Physick based on the below options::

data.name: SCH_ST_Heal_Lucid_Desc
data.value: Adds Lucid Dreaming when MP drops below slider value:

data.name: SCH_ST_Heal_Aetherflow_Desc
data.value: Use Aetherflow when out of Aetherflow stacks.

data.name: SCH_ST_Heal_Dissipation_Desc
data.value: Use Dissipation when out of Aetherflow stacks.

data.name: SCH_ST_Heal_Esuna_Desc
data.value: Applies Esuna to your target if there is a cleansable debuff.

data.name: SCH_AoE_Heal_Aetherflow_Desc
data.value: Use Aetherflow when out of Aetherflow stacks.

data.name: SCH_AoE_Heal_Dissipation_Desc
data.value: Use Dissipation when out of Aetherflow stacks.

data.name: SCH_AoE_Heal_Lucid_Desc
data.value: Adds Lucid Dreaming when MP isn't high enough to cast Succor.

data.name: SCH_Aetherflow_Desc
data.value: Change Aetherflow-using skills to Aetherflow, Recitation, or Dissipation as selected.

data.name: SCH_Aetherflow_Dissipation_Desc
data.value: If Aetherflow is on cooldown, show Dissipation instead.

data.name: SCH_Aetherflow_Recite_Desc
data.value: Prioritizes Recitation usage on Excogitation or Indomitability.

data.name: SCH_Lustrate_Desc
data.value: Change Lustrate into Excogitation when Excogitation is ready.

data.name: SCH_Recitation_Desc
data.value: Change Recitation into either Adloquium, Succor, Indomitability, or Excogitation when used.

data.name: SCH_DeploymentTactics_Desc
data.value: Changes Deployment Tactics to Adloquium until a party member has the Galvanize buff.

data.name: SCH_DeploymentTactics_Recitation_Desc
data.value: Adds Recitation when off cooldown to force a critical Galvanize buff on a party member.

data.name: SCH_FairyReminder_Desc
data.value: Change all fairy actions into Summon Eos when the Fairy is not summoned.

data.name: SCH_Consolation_Name
data.value: Fey Blessing to Seraph's Consolation Feature

data.name: SCH_Consolation_Desc
data.value: Change Fey Blessing into Consolation when Seraph is out.

data.name: SCH_Fairy_Combo_Desc
data.value: Change Whispering Dawn into Fey Illumination, Fey Blessing, then Whispering Dawn when used.

data.name: SCH_Raise_Desc
data.value: Changes Swiftcast to Resurrection while Swiftcast is on cooldown.

data.name: SCH_Raise_Retarget_Desc
data.value: Will Retarget the Raise affected here to your Heal Stack.

data.name: SCH_Mit_ST_Desc
data.value: Changes Protraction into (Optional Recitation)Adloquium followed by (Optional Deployment Tactics and Excogitation) Each action can be Retargeted with the Retargeting Features below.

data.name: SCH_Mit_AoE_Desc
data.value: Changes Sacred Soil into (optional Fey Illumination) then Succor or (Optional Self Targetted Recitation-Adloquium-Deployment Tactics) Finished with (Optional Expedient) and (Optional Seraph/Consolation) Can be Retargeted with the Retargeting Features below.

data.name: SCH_Retarget_Desc
data.value: Retargets Single Target Healing options. Even in the Standalone Features Above.

data.name: SCH_Retarget_Physick_Desc
data.value: Retargets Physick according to your Healing stack.

data.name: SCH_Retarget_Adloquium_Desc
data.value: Retargets Adloquium according to your Healing stack.

data.name: SCH_Retarget_Lustrate_Desc
data.value: Retargets Lustrate according to your Healing stack.

data.name: SCH_Retarget_Protraction_Desc
data.value: Retargets Protraction according to your Healing stack.

data.name: SCH_Retarget_DeploymentTactics_Desc
data.value: Retargets Deployment Tactics according to your Healing stack.

data.name: SCH_Retarget_Excogitation_Desc
data.value: Retargets Excogitation according to your Healing stack.

data.name: SCH_Retarget_Aetherpact_Desc
data.value: Retargets Aetherpact according to your Healing stack.

data.name: SCH_Raidwide_Desc
data.value: Collection of tools designed to try and cast during a raidwide attack when detected. This will work for most, but not all raidwide attacks and is no substitute for learning the fight

data.name: SCH_Raidwide_Succor_Desc
data.value: Will try to cast Succor when a raidwide casting is detected if shieldcheck from succor setting passes. Will be used in all 4 Advanced combos.

data.name: SCH_Raidwide_SacredSoil_Desc
data.value: Will try to use Sacred Soil on self when a raidwide casting is detected. Will be used in all 4 Advanced combos

data.name: SCH_Raidwide_Expedient_Desc
data.value: Will try to use Expedient when a raidwide casting is detected. Will be used in all 4 Advanced combos.

data.value: Will Retarget Rekindle to a tank that needs it, then a party member that need healing, before Self.

data.value: Emerald Ruin III to Ruin III Option

data.name: SMN_ST_Ruin3_Emerald_Ruin3_Desc
data.value: Replaces Emerald Ruin III with Ruin III in the rotation when standing still and Ruin Mastery III is not active (54-72). It is best, when using this, to set your Garuda to call last during those levels or it will not do other summons until you spend all garuda charges. Intended Mainly for 70 Ultimates where it would matter. (Not worth it for average use)
