data.name: VPR_AoE_AdvancedMode_Desc
data.value: Replaces Steel Maw with a full one-button AoE rotation. These features are ideal if you want to customize the rotation.

data.name: VPR_AoE_SerpentsIre_Desc
data.value: Adds Serpents Ire to the rotation.

data.name: VPR_AoE_VicepitCombo_Desc
data.value: Adds Swiftskin's Den and Hunter's Den to the rotation.

data.name: VPR_AoE_VicepitWeaves_Desc
data.value: Adds Twinfang Thresh and Twinblood Thresh to the rotation.

data.name: VPR_AoE_SerpentsTail_Desc
data.value: Adds Serpents Tail to the rotation.

data.name: VPR_AoE_UncoiledFury_Desc
data.value: Adds Uncoiled Fury to the rotation.

data.name: VPR_AoE_UncoiledFuryCombo_Desc
data.value: Adds Uncoiled Twinfang and Uncoiled Twinblood to the rotation.

data.name: VPR_AoE_ReawakenCombo_Desc
data.value: Adds Generations and Legacy weaves to the rotation.

data.name: VPR_AoE_StunInterupt_Desc
data.value: Adds Leg Sweep when target non-boss is casting.

data.name: VPR_AoE_ComboHeals_Desc
data.value: Adds Bloodbath and Second Wind to the rotation.

data.name: VPR_ST_BasicCombo_Desc
data.value: Replace Reaving Fangs with its combo chain.

data.name: VPR_VicewinderCoils_Desc
data.value: Replaces Vicewinder with Hunter's/Swiftskin's Coils. Will automatically swap depending on your position.

data.name: VPR_VicewinderCoils_oGCDs_Desc
data.value: Adds Twinfang and Twinblood to the button.

data.name: VPR_VicepitDens_oGCDs_Desc
data.value: Adds Twinfang and Twinblood to the button.

data.name: VPR_UncoiledTwins_Desc
data.value: Replaces Uncoiled Fury with Uncoiled Twinfang and Uncoiled Twinblood.

data.name: VPR_TwinTails_Desc
data.value: Combines Serpent's Tail, Twinfang, and Twinblood to one button.

data.name: VPR_SerpentsTail_Desc
data.value: Replaces basic combo with Death Rattle or Last Lash when applicable.

data.name: VPR_VicewinderProtection_Desc
data.value: Replaces Vicewinder / Vicepit with Savage Blade when you already have Vicewinder / Vicepit active.

data.name: WAR_ST_Simple_Desc
data.value: Replaces Heavy Swing with a full one-button single target rotation. This is the ideal option for newcomers to the job.

data.name: WAR_AoE_Simple_Desc
data.value: Replaces Overpower with a full one-button AoE rotation. This is the ideal option for newcomers to the job.

data.name: WAR_ST_Advanced_Desc
data.value: Replaces Heavy Swing with a full one-button single target rotation. These features are ideal if you want to customize the rotation.

data.name: WAR_ST_BalanceOpener_Desc
data.value: Adds the Balance opener at level 100.

data.name: WAR_ST_StormsEye_Desc
data.value: Adds Storm's Eye into the rotation.

data.name: WAR_ST_InnerRelease_Desc
data.value: Adds Berserk / Inner Release into the rotation.

data.name: WAR_ST_FellCleave_Desc
data.value: Adds Inner Beast / Fell Cleave into the rotation. - Will use at set minimum Beast Gauge value or to consume Inner Release stacks - Also includes Inner Chaos when available

data.name: WAR_ST_PrimalRend_Desc
data.value: Adds Primal Rend into the rotation.

data.name: WAR_ST_PrimalWrath_Desc
data.value: Adds Primal Wrath into the rotation.

data.name: WAR_ST_PrimalRuination_Desc
data.value: Adds Primal Ruination into the rotation.

data.name: WAR_ST_RangedUptime_Desc
data.value: Adds Tomahawk into the rotation when you are out of range.

data.name: WAR_ST_Interrupt_Desc
data.value: Adds Interject to the rotation when your target's cast is interruptible.

data.name: WAR_ST_Stun_Desc
data.value: Adds Low Blow to the rotation when your target is casting. Not advised outside of overworld content, as it can waste a lot of Low Blows on un-stun-able enemies, etc. Will try to not use it in boss fights.

data.name: WAR_AoE_Advanced_Desc
data.value: Replaces Overpower with a full one-button AoE rotation. These features are ideal if you want to customize the rotation.

data.name: WAR_AoE_InnerRelease_Desc
data.value: Adds Berserk / Inner Release into the AoE rotation.

data.name: WAR_AoE_Decimate_Desc
data.value: Adds Steel Cyclone / Decimate into the AoE rotation.

data.name: WAR_AoE_Infuriate_Desc
data.value: Adds Infuriate into the AoE rotation.

data.name: WAR_AoE_Onslaught_Desc
data.value: Adds Onslaught into the AoE rotation.

data.name: WAR_AoE_Orogeny_Desc
data.value: Adds Orogeny into the AoE rotation.

data.name: WAR_AoE_PrimalRend_Desc
data.value: Adds Primal Rend into the AoE rotation.

data.name: WAR_AoE_PrimalWrath_Desc
data.value: Adds Primal Wrath into the AoE rotation.

data.name: WAR_AoE_PrimalRuination_Desc
data.value: Adds Primal Ruination into the AoE rotation.

data.name: WAR_AoE_RangedUptime_Desc
data.value: Adds Tomahawk into the rotation when you are out of range.

data.name: WAR_AoE_Interrupt_Desc
data.value: Adds Interject to the AoE rotation when your target's cast is interruptible.

data.name: WAR_AoE_Stun_Desc
data.value: Adds Low Blow to the AoE rotation when your target is casting, interruptible or not.

data.name: WAR_Mitigation_Desc
data.value: Options for Advanced Combos' In-Combo Mitigation. Enable Mitigation in each Advanced Combo to use these options. (Simple Mode does not use these Options, instead Recommended Values in place of them)

data.name: WAR_Mitigation_NonBoss_Desc
data.value: Adds Mitigation to the combos when not in a boss encounter. Will not overlap separate options unless stated. Will not use mitigation in the first 15 seconds of a pull unless you are not moving.

data.name: WAR_Mitigation_NonBoss_Rampart_Desc
data.value: Adds Rampart when 3 or more targets

data.name: WAR_Mitigation_NonBoss_ThrillOfBattle_Desc
data.value: Adds Thrill Of Battle when 3 or more targets

data.name: WAR_Mitigation_NonBoss_Vengeance_Desc
data.value: Adds Vengeance/Damnation when 5 or more targets

data.name: WAR_Mitigation_NonBoss_ArmsLength_Desc
data.value: Adds Arm's Length when 5 or more targets

data.name: WAR_Mitigation_NonBoss_Reprisal_Desc
data.value: Adds Reprisal when 5 or more targets.

data.name: WAR_Mitigation_NonBoss_RawIntuition_Desc
data.value: Adds Raw Intuition/Bloodwhetting when available. Will overlap with others.

data.name: WAR_Mitigation_NonBoss_ShakeItOff_Desc
data.value: Adds Shake It Off for healing. Will not use when it would result in loss of Mitigation buffs.

data.name: WAR_Mitigation_Boss_Desc
data.value: Adds Mitigation to the combos when in a boss encounter. Will not overlap separate options unless stated.

data.name: WAR_Mitigation_Boss_RawIntuition_OnCD_Desc
data.value: Adds Raw Intuition/Bloodwhetting on CD when targetted

data.name: WAR_Mitigation_Boss_RawIntuition_TankBuster_Desc
data.value: Adds Raw Intuition/Bloodwhetting when tankbuster is detected.

data.name: WAR_Mitigation_Boss_Rampart_Desc
data.value: Adds Rampart when tankbuster is detected. Will not overlap with Vengeance/Damnation.

data.name: WAR_Mitigation_Boss_Vengeance_Desc
data.value: Adds Vengeance/Damnation when tankbuster is detected. Will not overlap with Rampart.

data.name: WAR_Mitigation_Boss_ThrillOfBattle_Desc
data.value: Adds Thrill of Battle when tankbuster is detected. Will not overlap unless below set threshold or aligned with rampart.

data.name: WAR_Mitigation_Boss_Reprisal_Desc
data.value: Adds Reprisal when raidwide casting is detected.

data.name: WAR_Mitigation_Boss_ShakeItOff_Desc
data.value: Adds Shake it Off when raidwide casting is detected.

data.name: WAR_Mit_OneButton_Desc
data.value: Replaces Thrill Of Battle with an all-in-one mitigation button.

data.name: WAR_Mit_Holmgang_Max_Desc
data.value: Gives max priority to Holmgang when the Health percentage threshold is met.

data.name: WAR_Mit_Bloodwhetting_Desc
data.value: Adds Raw Intuition / Bloodwhetting to the one-button mitigation.

data.name: WAR_Mit_Equilibrium_Desc
data.value: Adds Equilibrium to the one-button mitigation.

data.name: WAR_Mit_Reprisal_Desc
data.value: Adds Reprisal to the one-button mitigation. NOTE: Will not use unless there is a target within range to prevent waste

data.name: WAR_Mit_ThrillOfBattle_Desc
data.value: Adds Thrill Of Battle to the one-button mitigation. NOTE: even if disabled, will still try to use Thrill Of Battle as the lowest priority.

data.name: WAR_Mit_Rampart_Desc
data.value: Adds Rampart to the one-button mitigation.

data.name: WAR_Mit_ShakeItOff_Desc
data.value: Adds Shake It Off to the one-button mitigation.

data.name: WAR_Mit_ArmsLength_Desc
data.value: Adds Arm's Length to the one-button mitigation.

data.name: WAR_Mit_Vengeance_Desc
data.value: Adds Vengeance to the one-button mitigation.

data.name: WAR_Mit_Party_Desc
data.value: Replaces Shake It Off with Reprisal when ready.

data.name: WAR_FC_Features_Desc
data.value: Collection of Fell Cleave related features. Enable all for this to be an all-in-one Single Target Burst button.

data.name: WAR_FC_InnerRelease_Desc
data.value: Adds Berserk / Inner Release to Fell Cleave when available.

data.name: WAR_FC_Infuriate_Desc
data.value: Adds Infuriate to Fell Cleave when available.

data.name: WAR_FC_Onslaught_Desc
data.value: Adds Onslaught to Fell Cleave when available.

data.name: WAR_FC_Upheaval_Desc
data.value: Adds Upheaval to Fell Cleave when available.

data.name: WAR_FC_PrimalRend_Desc
data.value: Adds Primal Rend to Fell Cleave when available.

data.name: WAR_FC_PrimalWrath_Desc
data.value: Adds Primal Wrath to Fell Cleave when available.

data.name: WAR_FC_PrimalRuination_Desc
data.value: Adds Primal Ruination to Fell Cleave when available.

data.name: WAR_ST_StormsPathCombo_Desc
data.value: Replace Storm's Path with its combo chain.

data.name: WAR_ST_StormsEyeCombo_Desc
data.value: Replace Storm's Eye with its combo chain.

data.name: WAR_AoE_BasicCombo_Desc
data.value: Replace Mythril Tempest with its combo chain.

data.name: WAR_InfuriateFellCleave_Name
data.value: Infuriate on Fell Cleave / Decimate Feature

data.name: WAR_InfuriateFellCleave_Desc
data.value: Turns Fell Cleave and Decimate into Infuriate if at or under set gauge value.

data.name: WAR_InfuriateFellCleave_IRFirst_Desc
data.value: Prevents the use of Infuriate while you have Inner Release stacks available.

data.name: WAR_EyePath_Desc
data.value: Replaces Storm's Path with Storm's Eye when Surging Tempest buff needs refreshing.

data.name: WAR_PrimalCombo_InnerRelease_Desc
data.value: Turns Berserk / Inner Release into the Primal combo (Primal Rend -> Primal Ruination) on use.

data.name: WAR_ThrillEquilibrium_Name
data.value: Equilibirum to Thrill of Battle Feature

data.name: WAR_ThrillEquilibrium_Desc
data.value: Replaces Equilibirum with Thrill of Battle when ready.

data.name: WAR_NascentFlash_Desc
data.value: Replace Nascent Flash with Raw intuition when level synced below 76.

data.name: WAR_RawIntuition_Targeting_Name
data.value: Raw Intuition to Nascent Flash Retargeting Feature

data.name: WAR_RawIntuition_Targeting_Desc
data.value: If available, will replace the Raw Intuition/Bloodwhetting with Nascent Flash if you are hard targeting an ally.

data.name: WAR_RawIntuition_Targeting_MO_Desc
data.value: If mousing over an ally in the UI, will Retarget Nascent Flash onto them.

data.name: WAR_RawIntuition_Targeting_TT_Desc
data.value: If your target's target is not you, will Retarget Nascent Flash onto them. (if you're not top aggro, and not mousing over or hard targeting an ally)

data.name: WAR_RetargetOnslaught_Desc
data.value: Will retarget Onslaught to your field or UI mouseover target (If Hostile) or the nearest hostile target to your mouseover target (If friendly).

data.name: WAR_ArmsLengthLockout_Desc
data.value: Will lock out Arm's Length in boss encounters when you already have knockback immunity from Inner Release.

data.name: WAR_RetargetHolmgang_Desc
data.value: Will Retarget Holmgang to yourself, instead of letting it go on enemies.

data.name: WHM_ST_Simple_DPS_Desc
data.value: Replaces Stone with a full one-button single target rotation. This is the ideal option for newcomers to the job.

data.name: WHM_AoE_Simple_DPS_Desc
data.value: Replaces Holy with a full one-button AoE rotation. This is the ideal option for newcomers to the job.

data.name: WHM_SimpleSTHeals_Desc
data.value: Replaces Cure with a full one-button single target healing utility. This is the ideal option for newcomers to the job. Particularly with autorotation.

data.name: WHM_Simple_AoEHeals_Desc
data.value: Replaces Medica with a full one-button single target healing utility. This is the ideal option for newcomers to the job. Particularly with autorotation.

data.name: WHM_ST_MainCombo_Desc
data.value: Collection of cooldowns and spell features on Glares/Stones/Aeros/Dia.

data.name: WHM_ST_MainCombo_Opener_Desc
data.value: Adds the Balance opener from level 92 onwards.

data.name: WHM_ST_MainCombo_Move_DoT_Desc
data.value: Will reapply DoT early to all enemies within range while moving.

data.name: WHM_ST_MainCombo_DoT_Desc
data.value: Adds Aero/Dia to the single target combo if the debuff is not present on current target, or is about to expire.

data.name: WHM_ST_MainCombo_Assize_Desc
data.value: Adds Assize to the single target combo.

data.name: WHM_ST_MainCombo_GlareIV_Desc
data.value: Adds Glare IV to the single target combo when under Sacred Sight

data.name: WHM_ST_MainCombo_Misery_Desc
data.value: Adds Afflatus Misery to the single target combo when it is ready to be used.

data.name: WHM_ST_MainCombo_LilyOvercap_Desc
data.value: Adds Afflatus Rapture to the single target combo when at three Lilies.

data.name: WHM_ST_MainCombo_PresenceOfMind_Desc
data.value: Adds Presence of Mind to the single target combo.

data.name: WHM_ST_MainCombo_Lucid_Desc
data.value: Adds Lucid Dreaming to the single target combo when below set MP value.

data.name: WHM_AoE_DPS_Desc
data.value: Collection of cooldowns and spell features on Holy/Holy III.

data.name: WHM_AoE_DPS_SwiftHoly_Desc
data.value: Adds a Swiftcast->Holy at the beginning of your AoE rotation. Requires you to already be in combat, to have stopped moving, and to not have used Assize yet.

data.name: WHM_AoE_DPS_Assize_Desc
data.value: Adds Assize to the AoE combo.

data.name: WHM_AoE_DPS_GlareIV_Desc
data.value: Adds Glare IV to the AoE combo when under Sacred Sight

data.name: WHM_AoE_DPS_Misery_Desc
data.value: Adds Afflatus Misery to the AoE combo when it is ready to be used.

data.name: WHM_AoE_DPS_LilyOvercap_Desc
data.value: Adds Afflatus Rapture to the AoE combo when at three Lilies.

data.name: WHM_AoE_DPS_PresenceOfMind_Desc
data.value: Adds Presence of Mind to the AoE combo

data.name: WHM_AoE_DPS_Lucid_Desc
data.value: Adds Lucid Dreaming to the AoE combo when below the set MP value if you are moving or it can be weaved without GCD delay.

data.name: WHM_STHeals_Desc
data.value: Replaces Cure with a one button single target healing setup.

data.name: WHM_STHeals_Esuna_Desc
data.value: Applies Esuna to your target if there is a cleansable debuff.

data.name: WHM_STHeals_Temperance_Desc
data.value: Adds Temperance and it's followup Divine Caress.

data.name: WHM_AoEHeals_Desc
data.value: Replaces Medica with a one button AoE healing setup.

data.name: WHM_AoEHeals_Medica2_Desc
data.value: Uses Medica II when heal target doesn't have Medica II buff. Upgrades to Medica III when level allows.

data.name: WHM_AoEHeals_Cure3_Desc
data.value: Replaces Medica with Cure III when available.

data.name: WHM_AoEHeals_Asylum_Desc
data.value: Adds Asylum placement, when standing still, to the rotation. Will Retarget it onto yourself.

data.name: WHM_AoEHeals_Temperance_Desc
data.value: Uses Temperance when available for a healing boost whenever the party average falls below the set threshold.

data.name: WHM_AoEHeals_DivineCaress_Desc
data.value: Uses Divine Caress when Divine Grace from Temperance is active.

data.name: WHM_AoEHeals_LiturgyOfTheBell_Desc
data.value: Adds Liturgy of the Bell (Lilybell) placement to the rotation.

data.name: WHM_Raise_Retarget_Desc
data.value: Will Retarget the Raise affected here to your Raise Stack.

data.name: WHM_ThinAirRaise_Desc
data.value: Adds Thin Air to the Global Raise Feature/Alternative Raise Feature.

data.name: WHM_RaptureMisery_Desc
data.value: Replaces Afflatus Rapture with Afflatus Misery when it is ready to be used.

data.name: WHM_SolaceMisery_Desc
data.value: Replaces Afflatus Solace with Afflatus Misery when it is ready to be used. Solace can be Retargeted with the Retargeting Features below.

data.name: WHM_CureSync_Desc
data.value: Changes Cure II to Cure when synced below Lv.30. Can be Retargeted with the Retargeting Features below.

data.name: WHM_Mit_ST_Desc
data.value: Changes Aquaveil into Tetragrammaton and/or Divine Benison after use. Each action can be Retargeted with the Retargeting Features below.

data.name: WHM_Mit_AoE_Desc
data.value: Changes Asylum into Temperance and then Divine Caress after use. Can be Retargeted with the Retargeting Features below.

data.name: WHM_Retargets_Desc
data.value: Collection of Options to Retarget Manually-Used Single Target Heals.

data.name: WHM_Re_Cure_Desc
data.value: Retargets Cure to the heal stack (even from the Cure II Sync Feature above).

data.name: WHM_Re_Cure2_Desc
data.value: Retargets Cure II to the heal stack.

data.name: WHM_Re_Solace_Desc
data.value: Retargets Afflatus Solace to the heal stack (even from the Solace into Misery Feature above).

data.name: WHM_Re_Aquaveil_Desc
data.value: Retargets Aquaveil to the heal stack (even from the Mitigation Feature above).

data.name: WHM_Re_Asylum_Desc
data.value: Retargets Asylum to yourself (even from the Mitigation Feature above).

data.name: WHM_Re_LiturgyOfTheBell_Desc
data.value: Retargets Liturgy Of The Bell to yourself.

data.name: WHM_Re_Cure3_Desc
data.value: Retargets Cure 3 to the heal stack.

data.name: WHM_Re_Benediction_Desc
data.value: Retargets Benediction to the heal stack.

data.name: WHM_Re_Tetragrammaton_Desc
data.value: Retargets Tetragrammaton to the heal stack (even from the Mitigation Feature above).

data.name: WHM_Re_Regen_Desc
data.value: Retargets Regen to the heal stack.

data.name: WHM_Re_DivineBenison_Desc
data.value: Retargets Divine Benison to the heal stack (even from the Mitigation Feature above).

data.name: WHM_Raidwide_Desc
data.value: Collection of tools designed to try and cast during a raidwide attack when detected. This will work for most, but not all raidwide attacks and is no substitute for learning the fight

data.name: WHM_Raidwide_Asylum_Desc
data.value: Will try to Weave Asylum when a raidwide casting. Will be used in all 4 main combos.

data.name: WHM_Raidwide_Temperance_Desc
data.value: Will try to Weave Temperance and Divine Caress when a raidwide casting. Will be used in all 4 main combos.

data.name: WHM_Raidwide_LiturgyOfTheBell_Desc
data.value: Will try to weave LiturgyOfTheBell when a raidwide casting. Will be used in all 4 main combos.

data.name: WHM_Raidwide_PlenaryIndulgence_Desc
data.value: Will try to weave Plenary Indulgence when a raidwide casting. Will be used in all 4 main combos.

data.name: DOL_Eureka_Desc
data.value: Replaces Ageless Words and Solid Reason with Wise to the World when available

data.name: DOL_NodeSearchingBuffs_Desc
data.value: Replaces Lay of the Lands or Arbor Calls with Prospect/Triangulate and Truth of Mountains/Forests if not active.

data.name: FSH_CastHook_Desc
data.value: Replaces Cast with Hook when fishing

data.name: FSH_Swim_Desc
data.value: Replace fishing abilities with diving abilities when underwater

data.name: FSH_CastGig_Desc
data.value: Replaces Cast with Gig when diving.

data.name: FSH_SurfaceTrade_Name
data.value: Surface Slap to Veteran Trade Option

data.name: FSH_SurfaceTrade_Desc
data.value: Replaces Surface Slap with Veteran Trade when diving.

data.name: FSH_PrizeBounty_Name
data.value: Prize Catch to Nature's Bounty Option

data.name: FSH_PrizeBounty_Desc
data.value: Replaces Prize Catch with Nature's Bounty when diving.

data.name: FSH_SnaggingSalvage_Desc
data.value: Replaces Snagging with Salvage when diving.

data.name: FSH_CastLight_ElectricCurrent_Name
data.value: Cast Light to Electric Current Option

data.name: FSH_CastLight_ElectricCurrent_Desc
data.value: Replaces Cast Light with Electric Current when diving.

data.name: FSH_Mooch_SharkEye_Desc
data.value: Replaces Mooch with Shark Eye when diving.

data.name: FSH_FishEyes_VitalSight_Name
data.value: Fish Eyes to Vital Sight Option

data.name: FSH_FishEyes_VitalSight_Desc
data.value: Replaces Fish Eyes with Vital Sight when diving.

data.name: FSH_Chum_BaitedBreath_Desc
data.value: Replaces Chum with Baited Breath when diving.

data.name: PvP_EmergencyHeals_Desc
data.value: Uses Recuperate when your HP is under the set threshold and you have sufficient MP.

data.name: PvP_EmergencyGuard_Desc
data.value: Uses Guard when your HP is under the set threshold.

data.name: PvP_QuickPurify_Desc
data.value: Uses Purify when afflicted with any selected debuff.

data.name: PvP_MashCancel_Desc
data.value: Stops you cancelling your guard if you're pressing buttons quickly by replacing your buttons with Savage Blade.

data.name: PvP_MashCancelRecup_Desc
data.value: Allows you to cancel your guard with Recuperate on the Guard button if health is low enough to not waste it.

data.name: ASTPvP_Burst_Desc
data.value: Turns Fall Malefic into an all-in-one damage button.

data.name: ASTPvP_Burst_DrawCard_Desc
data.value: Adds Drawing Cards to Burst Mode.

data.name: ASTPvP_Burst_PlayCard_Desc
data.value: Adds Playing Cards to Burst Mode.

data.name: ASTPvP_Burst_DoubleMalefic_Desc
data.value: Adds Double Malefic Cast to Burst Mode.

data.name: ASTPvP_Burst_DoubleGravity_Desc
data.value: Adds Double Gravity Cast to Burst Mode.

data.name: ASTPvP_Burst_Gravity_Desc
data.value: Adds Gravity Cast to Burst Mode.

data.name: ASTPvP_Burst_Macrocosmos_Desc
data.value: Adds Macrocosmos to Burst Mode. If Double Gravity is enabled, it will hold Macrocosmos for the double gravity burst.

data.name: ASTPvP_Diabrosis_Desc
data.value: Adds Role Action Diabrosis to Burst Mode below selected health

data.name: ASTPvP_Burst_Heal_Desc
data.value: Adds Aspected Benefic when target is below set health

data.name: BLMPvP_BurstMode_Desc
data.value: Turns Fire into an all-in-one button. - Uses Blizzard spells while moving (One Button Mode only). - Will use Paradox when appropriate.

data.name: BLMPvP_Burst_Desc
data.value: Uses Burst when available. - Requires target to be within range.

data.name: BLMPvP_Xenoglossy_Desc
data.value: Uses Xenoglossy when available. - Requires target's HP to be under:

data.name: BLMPvP_Lethargy_Desc
data.value: Uses Lethargy when available. - Will not use against non-players. - Requires target's HP to be under:

data.name: BLMPvP_ElementalWeave_Desc
data.value: Uses Wreath of Fire when available. - Requires player's HP to be at or above:

data.name: BLMPvP_ElementalStar_Desc
data.value: Uses Elemental Star when available. - Prioritizes Flare Star unless expiring.

data.name: BLMPvP_PhantomDart_Desc
data.value: Uses Phantom Dart (if selected) when available at or below set health threshold.

data.name: BLMPvP_Manipulation_Feature_Desc
data.value: Adds Purify when affected by crowd control. - Requires Purify to be available.

data.name: BRDPvP_BurstMode_Desc
data.value: Turns Powerful Shot into an all-in-one damage button.

data.name: BRDPvP_SilentNocturne_Desc
data.value: Adds Silent Nocturne to Burst Mode.

data.name: BRDPvP_ApexArrow_Desc
data.value: Adds Apex Arrow to Burst Mode.

data.name: BRDPvP_BlastArrow_Desc
data.value: Adds Blast Arrow to Burst Mode.

data.name: BRDPvP_HarmonicArrow_Desc
data.value: Adds Harmonic Arrow to Burst Mode. Will use it at set number of charges AND when target is below the health threshold per charge for execute.

data.name: BRDPvP_EncoreOfLight_Desc
data.value: Adds Encore of Light to Burst Mode.
